          <title>
            <string language="en">A pie chart showing the causes of death in Britain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kreisdiagramm, welches die Ursachen des Todes

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un diagramme circulaire circulaire montrant les

          </title>
